about.title: About us
about.text-1: There is a small shelter at the bottom of Tenkes, in Sikl√≥s, Baranya county, which is fighting for its survival‚ùóÔ∏è Some of us, enthusiastic animal lovers, have taken on the serious task voluntarily, at the end of our work, in our free time, often beyond our means, to take care of the shelter. There are only a few of us, which is always a huge problem! We often struggle with the tasks that need to be taken care of as there are so many.
about.text-2: We take in the dogs admitted to the Sikl√≥s Ebrend√©szet after 45 days and we look for new owners for them. We will do everything we can and within our means! In 2022 (and in the previous years as well), we managed to find new owners for nearly 100 shelter dogs and many others where organizations or individuals asked for our help.
about.text-3: There is a small shelter at the bottom of Tenkes, which we could not maintain without your help‚ùóÔ∏è We don't have a license yet to function as an official shelter, but we have already met many conditions, thanks to the 1% you offered! Last year, we built 12 kennels and 2 small convalescent, heated kennels in accordance with the regulations. In addition, we also met the conditions for dry food storage, water block, lighting, sewage drainage and many more.
about.text-4: We have to completely demolish the old kennels. They are out of date, they are old, they get wet, they do not meet the regulations! We are lucky that they lasted until now. We were able to move the dogs at the last minute. The last windstorm had rendered them completely unusable.
about.text-5: Unfortunately, there are more and more senior dogs coming in, whose final home will be the shelter, so we would like to build a new Senior kennel series for them in place of the old kennels, where they can live out their last years in dignified conditions.
about.text-6: In addition, we warmly welcome volunteers to join our small team! üôè Thanks for your support and thanks for joining us! ‚ù§Ô∏è

adopt.title: Adoptable Dog
adopt.subtitle-1: Senior Falc√≥ is looking for his forever home!
adopt.text-1: He is hoping that someone will still adopt him and give him a home for the rest of his life. He is around 12 years old and a lively and active dog! He loves to take walks.‚ù§Ô∏è He doesn't hear well, but he is very alert and nothing can escape his attention.‚ù§Ô∏è He doesn't have big needs. He just wants to be free and sometimes snuggle a bit with his owner and loved ones. We are hoping that someone will fall in love with him as he is such a sweet dog üôè.
adopt.subtitle-2: Bella is looking for her forever homeüíû
adopt.text-2: Unfortunately, the owners‚Äô living situation has changed, they are moving to a sublet, they cannot take Bella with them. Bella is a friendly, playful small dog. She will be one and a half years old on November 7. We are looking for a loving owner for her. Bella is temporarily in Hark√°ny until we will find her forever home. For further details about Bella, please call ‚òéÔ∏è 06202520162. Thanks for sharing!
adopt.text-3: Bobi is a 2-3 year old Puli-type male dog. He was brought to us in a terrible condition, after wandering for days by the busy road in the hot sun, waiting for someone to take pity on him and take him home! It's a wonder he didn't get hit by a car! He does not have a chip, based on its condition, we are not looking for its original owner! Probably no one misses him! We freed him from his smelly, heavy fur so we could finally see who was under the coat. üòä Bobi is now smiling and waiting for his potential adopters to find him! ‚ù§Ô∏è He is friendly, a good-natured dog, a little bigger than a Puli. He can quickly steal your heart. He is completely neutral towards other dogs. Can be walked nicely on a leash. He is vaccinated, microchipped and can be adopted with a sterilization contract! ‚òéÔ∏è +36 70 5876260 Sikl√≥s
adopt.text-4: Pocok is a very sweet, 8 year old female chihuahua üíó When you walk her, you will fall in love with her immediately, yet no one showed interest in adopting her yet! She is a fence-climbing champion, so a "safe" fence is necessary, or we recommend her as an indoor dog only! She likes to walk and can walk nicely. We also recommend her to elderly people! She could be someone's loyal companion! ‚òéÔ∏è +36 70 5876260 Sikl√≥s
adopt.text-5: Jack is a 1-1.5 year old, extremely friendly dog. He feels very alone here at the shelter.üòî He would be a good playmate for a dog at home! We are looking for a loving family for him! Thanks for sharing! ‚òéÔ∏è 06705876260 Sikl√≥s

happy-stories.title: Happy stories
happy-stories.text-1: Pufi has been with us at the shelter for a long while now. We couldn't believe our eyes when we received a letter of introduction very dear to our hearts, in which it was stated that this family would like to adopt Pufi! There was only one condition, the owners could only take Pufi after a month. That one month was very long! We were just hoping that they would really come for Pufi! And they came! ‚ù§Ô∏è That's how Pufi set off on the long journey, and now he's telling everyone that he doesn't even want to come back! üòÅ He loves to be on the couch he loves his owners and follows them everywhere! He has gone to a wonderful family! Pufi enjoys every moment of freedom, the big garden and lots of love! Pufi, we miss you so much, but you so deserved this wonderful fate that was waiting for you. Thank you very much to the owners for choosing you! Be very happy with Pufi, may he bring you much joy in life! ‚ù§Ô∏è
happy-stories.text-2: Pic√∫r (Tiny) is also looking for her forever home. She is a young, tiny little girl. Unfortunately, her life didn't start well, but we hope things will change for her in a new home! üòî She was hit by a car earlier and unfortunately a doctor did not see her. We suspect that she could have been hurt by people too. One of her legs still hurts, but it's healing nicely. We are looking for a loving family for her. Pic√∫r is a very cheerful and lovable dog! If you would like to adopt her, please give us a call! ‚òéÔ∏è 06705876260 (Sikl√≥s)
happy-stories.text-3: P√∂tyi is looking for a home! üòä Unfortunately, my owner can no longer take care of me. üòû I‚Äôm a little sad now because everything is new here and I miss my owner, but I‚Äôm a calm, cuddly, lovable dog. I love to play and get along well with cats too. I really wish to find my new loving home soon ‚ù§Ô∏è ‚òéÔ∏è 06705876260 (Sikl√≥s)
happy-stories.subtitle-4: Update: Adoption is pending for Blanka üòä
happy-stories.text-4: Our snow-white princess Blanka, nearly 2, seeks her forever home. ü§ç Medium-sized, beautiful, friendly, and affectionate, she's been waiting for love since January. A playful soul, she'd make a great companion for another dog. Alex, her friend, found a home; now Blanka eagerly awaits hers. ‚òéÔ∏è 06705876260 (Sikl√≥s)
happy-stories.text-5: Joey is a 5-6 months old young puppy (male) who is looking for a home. Will it be you giving him a forever home? Shelter: Tenkesalja √Ållatv√©d≈ë Egyes√ºlet/Tenkesalja Animal Association, Magyarorszag/Hungary
happy-stories.text-6: The Tenkesalja Animal Association in Hungary is searching for a home for Lexi, a 7 year old female dog, who‚Äôs owner passed away. ‚òéÔ∏è 70/ 587 6260

volunteer.title: Volunteer
volunteer.content-1: Our organization is funded by donations and volunteer work. We rely on your generosity and support to be able to help all the animals in our care.
volunteer.content-2: The incoming requests can be overwhelming sometimes as well, so any help from your end will make a difference.
volunteer.content-4: Note that due to the limited funds available, volunteering is non-paid.
volunteer.content-5: You can help us in many different ways, including:

options.2: Spending some time with the animals
options.8: Animal grooming for dogs and cats

foster.title: Become a Foster Home
foster.content-1: Fostering a neglected or abandoned dog or cat is one of the most important and extremely rewarding aspects of animal rescue. Although we keep animals at our shelter, being able to place some animals with families will give them a chance to be in a home environment, get more attention and love, become familiar with new things, and learn about all aspects of living with humans and other animals if you have other pets as well. While this animal stays in your home, we will be searching for a forever home for that animal.
foster.content-2: The time an animal spends in foster care might differ based on:
foster.content-3: Our rescue will supply food and any necessary veterinary care needed during the foster period.
foster.content-4: Some basic requirements we ask from our foster families:
foster.content-5: Let us know if this is something that interests you! Contact us today so that together we can save more lives!
foster.list-1: their personality (in case they need more training or need more socialization)
foster.list-3: the length it takes for our rescue to find a forever home for him/her.
foster.list-4: Your own pets must have their vaccinations up to date
foster.list-5: Your own pets must be spayed/neutered
foster.list-6: Having a separate room or area to confine the foster pet, if necessary
foster.list-7: Spending time to care for the animal you would like to foster is very important
foster.list-8: The foster agreement must be abided by.

donate.title: Donate
donate.subtitle-2: There are several ways you can support us, which includes
donate.content-7: By donating new items or items you don't need (toys, blankets, dog food etc.)
donate.content-9: for more details about what we need the most at our shelter.

donate-to-us.title: Donating Items To Us
donate-to-us.subtitle: Our organization depends on the donation of the public
donate-to-us.details: Let it be something new that you might wish to give us or something used, we would be glad if you would like to support our cause. We work very hard to save the lives of many animals. This means we use a lot of things in our facility on a daily basis that need to be refilled. See a list of items below for more details.

food.title: Dog food
food.list-1: Dry food and canned food for puppies, young dogs, adult dogs and elderly dogs
food.list-2: Dietary food for sick and obese dogs

accessories.title: Accessories for dogs
accessories.list-7: Brushes, combs, hair trimmers, nail cutters
accessories.list-8: Collars and leashes in all sizes

medicines.title: Medicines, Medical Devices
medicines.list-8: Protective & recovery collars/cones for our operated animals and animals injured in an accident

form.type: Type of volunteering I am interested in

options.select: What would you like to help us with?
options.8: Training of animals and animal rehabilitation
options.10: Be a foster home, click here for more information
options.12: Veterinary care (from veterinarians and animal technicians)
